short_summary: Digital fire training aid for workplace safety
description: Request for Proposal for the procurement of a Digital Fire Training Aid.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Information**

* **Title (English)**: Digital Fire Training Aid (W0133-24T035)
* **Title (French)**: Système de formation numérique sur les extincteurs d’incendie (W0133-24T035)
* **Reference Number**: WS4151933644-Doc4213911017
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4151933644
* **Publication Date**: September 15, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 12, 2024 at 2:00 PM
* **Amendment Date**: September 28, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not yet specified
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not yet specified
* **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)

**Competition Details**
* **Category**: Workplace safety training aids and materials (UNSPSC 46211500)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Details**

* **GSA Information**: Not applicable
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Contactor Information**: Christine Cress, christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Document Accessibility**

To access the full tender announcement, please refer to: http://[encrypted URL] ...

To stay up to date with the competition process, please continually monitor the [link]. The tender period has ended. The contract has not yet been awarded. A request for proposal will be released in due course. Should further information be required regarding this tender, kindly contact Christine Cress at the above-mentioned email address.
